ReportItem.description:
This script displays, for each tested host, information about the scan itself :
- The version of the plugin set - The type of scanner (Nessus or Nessus Home) - The version of the Nessus Engine - The port scanner(s) used - The port range scanned - Whether credentialed or third-party patch management checks are possible - The date of the scan - The duration of the scan - The number of hosts scanned in parallel - The number of checks done in parallel
ReportItem.plugin_output:
Information about this scan :
Nessus version : 5.2.4 Plugin feed version : 201401061716 Scanner edition used : Nessus Home Scan policy used : pci Scanner IP : 127.0.0.1 Port scanner(s) : nessus_tcp_scanner Port range : 1-65535 Thorough tests : no Experimental tests : no Paranoia level : 2 Report Verbosity : 1 Safe checks : yes Optimize the test : yes Credentialed checks : yes Patch management checks : None CGI scanning : enabled Web application tests : enabled Web app tests - Test mode : single Web app tests - Try all HTTP methods : yes Web app tests - Maximum run time : 10 minutes. Web app tests - Stop at first flaw : param Max hosts : 20 Max checks : 4 Recv timeout : 15 Backports : None Allow post-scan editing: Yes Scan Start Date : 2014/1/7 0:21 Scan duration : 28683 sec
